ID: C19R192_02
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Romy Ammar <Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com>; Nawal Khasheem <Nawal.Khasheem@chalhoub.com>; Norah Alyami <Norah.Alyami@chalhoub.com>
CC: Wassem Dalloul <Md.wassem.Dalloul@chalhoub.com>; Amr Gamaledin <Amr.Gamaledin@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-18 10:18
Subject: RE: Outdoor Event , Diriyah 
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Insurance covers transport by staff up to USD 1,500,000 subject to Two Person Warranty when carrying in excess of USD 500,000. So as long as there are at least 2 staff members accompanying the transit with proper precautionary measures taken, there is no issue.

 

However, please provide the full details of the venue/event, duration, the security protocols in place, pieces are for display behind locked glass or will handled as well during the event? 

 

Please provide any relevant details. There will not be any additional premium charged. However, we have a declaration requirement.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Dear Hagop,

Details of the venue:
It will take place in Jax, an art district in Diriyah, where artist have their art pieces showcased in their own warehouse. 
We took over warehouse F05 
Duration: 3 hours from (10:00pm - 1:00 am )

Details of the venue:
It will take place in Jax, an art district in Diriyah, where artist have their art pieces showcased in their own warehouse. 
We took over warehouse F05 
Duration: 3 hours from (10:00pm - 1:00 am )

There will be no security there, so we need to provide one.
Best regards..

Nourah Alyami
